Reviews.Title: TOP Quality Tablet Great deal!
Reviews.Author: May
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet about two weeks ago. I am new to tablets and know little about them or how to use them. This tablet was a very good bargin and compared very well to other top line tablets. I have had no problems since this purchase other than a learning curve. Very happy with the size, the performance and the price! I believe this is an excellent tablet for beginners and the pro as well!

ProductInfo.Features:
Gorgeous appearance: Larger 9-inch HD display with 800*480 resolutions; 5-point TFT capacitive touch screen
Fastest - most advanced Dual-Core AllWinner A20 Cortex A7 1.2Ghz with Mali-400 4MP GPU
The newest, most popular and hottest system: Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean operating system | Support Google Play Store - access to millions of free and paid-for applications available to download straight to your tablet
WiFi 802.11 b/g/n Support - Connect to internet for A full Internet experience
Supports 1080p HD play, HDMI output (Cable sold separately), G-sensor and 3D games
ProductInfo.Name: 9.0in Fastest Dual-Core Android 4.2 Tablet PC Capacitive HDMI Google Play Store
